# Benchmark corpus for LLM recipe generation
# Lines starting with # are comments
# One repo per line in owner/repo format

# CLI tools with complex release naming
cli/cli
BurntSushi/ripgrep
sharkdp/bat
junegunn/fzf
jesseduffield/lazygit

# Kubernetes/DevOps tools
derailed/k9s
stern/stern
k3d-io/k3d
kubernetes-sigs/kind
aquasecurity/trivy

# Security/encryption tools
FiloSottile/age

# Go tools with standard naming
golangci/golangci-lint
goreleaser/goreleaser

# Rust tools
ast-grep/ast-grep
lsd-rs/lsd
eza-community/eza

# Infrastructure tools
terraform-linters/tflint
runatlantis/atlantis

# Development tools
nektos/act
charmbracelet/glow
extrawurst/gitui

# Misc popular tools
ajeetdsouza/zoxide
sharkdp/fd
ogham/exa
starship/starship
